sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Hezekiahs recovery. Or, A sermon, shevving what use Hezekiah did, and all should make of their deliverance from sicknesse. First preached, and now published by Robert Harris, pastor of Hanwell Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.
[8], 48 p.
Printed by R[obert] Y[oung] for Iohn Bartlet, at the golden Cup in the Goldsmiths Row in Cheape-side, London : Anno M.DC.XXVI. [1626]
On Isaiah XXXVIII, 9-20. Printer's name from STC. Running title reads: Hezekiah's recoverie. With an inserted errata leaf. Variant: lacking errata. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Printed by R[obert] Y[oung] for Iohn Bartlet, at the golden Cup in the Goldsmiths Row in Cheape-side, London : Anno M.DC.XXVI. [1626]
On Isaiah XXXVIII, 9-20. Printer's name from STC. Running title reads: Hezekiah's recoverie. With an inserted errata leaf. Variant: lacking errata. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
